290779.「どうした？ <pc>。\n かつての主 不死の魔王のチカラが\n 我に宿ってい:
Surprised? Surely you knew that the power of
my master, the Immortal Demon King, flows
within me.

290780.「貴様らに つかの間の勝利を 与えたのは\n ５つの 闇のキーエンブレムを\n:
This brief victory that I gave you was only
so that I could obtain the five Dark Key
Emblems!

290781.「……これで 準備は ととのった。:
And now, the preparations are finally
complete...

290782.「我らが王 冥王ネルゲル様！\n 今こそ 完全なる復活を とげたまえ……:
The great Netherlord Nergel! It is now time
for your complete resurrection!

290783.「ちっ……邪魔が 入ったか。: Tch... the annoying insects are here.

290784.「叡智の冠 あるかぎり\n 貴様らの好きには させぬぞ！:
As long as the Crown of Wisdom exists, I
cannae let you just do as you please!

290785.「今だ！ <pc>！\n その祭壇を 壊すのだっ！！:
Now, <pc>!
You must destroy that altar!

290786.「ぐうっ！ あと一歩というところで……！\n 申し訳…ございません……:
Urgh!! We were so close...
F... forgive me...

290788.「愚か者めが。\n この失態 貴様の命で償うがよい。:
You fool. The price of your failure shall be
your life.

290791.「冥王ネルゲル様……\n 我が命を あなた様の 復活への\n 最後の贄に 捧げま:
Nergel, my Lord... I offer you my life as the
final sacrifice for your resurrection.

290795.「<pc>よ。\n 今すぐ 貴様と 決着をつけてもよいが\n かような場所では:
Oh, <pc>... I'd love to settle
my score with you. However, this place is a
bit too boring for my taste...

290796.「我が居城 神殿レイダメテスへ 来るがよい。\n ……それが 貴様の最期となろう:
Come then, to my temple of Reidametes.
It will be there that you shall meet your end.

290797.「なんということだ。\n これまでの苦労が 水の泡か……。:
Aye, what a mess... To think all of our hard
work just went down the drain...

290799.「さっきまで\n 井戸の底に いたはずなのに……。\n ここは どこなんだレロ～:
Last thing I remember, I was in that well,
and... where the oink am I?!

290800.「ひぃっ 乱暴は やめてレロ！\n ボク 悪いトンブレロじゃ ないレロ～！:
Eeek, don't hurt me! I'm a good Ham Shamwitch,
I promise! Oink!

290801.「……よりによって あんな トンブレロに\n 冥王ネルゲルの魂が 宿っていたとは:
Of all the places for Nergel's soul to hide
in, he chose that little beastie... He had us
completely fooled!

290802.「……よしっ！ 気持ちを 切り換えて\n これからのことを 相談するとしよう。:
O-kay! Let's collect our thoughts and decide
what ta do next!

290803.「<pc> エイドス ブロッゲン！\n いったん わしの隠れ家に 引き上げるぞ！:
All right, you three!
Let's all head back to my hideout!
